title: Cant log in please
body: Spent the last 3 hours or so looking up fixes and nothing has worked, i recently reconnected my telstra internet and now when i attempt to log in it stays on logging on pop up then goes straight to cannot connect to pvp.net server tried flushing dns restarting everything, called telstra and the most they had to contribute was asking if i had restarted my computer and router. please somebody help

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried [switching to a public DNS server](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)?
